scripts.mmd: mmdc -c mermaid-config.json -i src/diagrams/gitflow.mmd -o dist/diagrams/gitflow.svg && mmdc -c mermaid-config.json -i src/diagrams/trunk.mmd -o dist/diagrams/trunk.svg
scripts.prepare: mkdir -p dist && cp -r fonts dist/ && cp -r styles dist/ && cp -r src/diagrams dist/
scripts.html: npm run prepare && cd dist && pandoc ../src/README.md ../src/docs/WORKFLOW.md --css=styles/ebook.css --css=styles/refcard.css --standalone --embed-resources --metadata title="Guia Completo de Git (Git Flow & Trunk-Based)" --metadata author="Italo" --metadata lang="pt-BR" --toc --toc-depth=3 -o ebook.html
scripts.build: npm run diag && npm run mmd && npm run html && npm run pdf
